attributes.title: don’t download
attributes.review: absolutely awful 😡 took forever to download and i had to give out my personal information! it also hacked my phone and now it’s taking mad long just to write this review. i wanted to support our non racist and homophobic president but now i can’t. what a shame😔

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: The app threatened to expose PRIVATE information if I didn’t support Trump. I am a Trump supporter and a proud American patriot 🇺🇸 🇺🇸 🇺🇸 BUT DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!! I had to change my phone number because of it and I was very scared!! DO. NOT. DOWNLOAD. HELP SPREAD THE WORD!!!

attributes.title: horrible!!!!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.review: this app took years to properly download onto my phone!!! i started in 1875 and it didn’t completely install until now!!! trash. on top of that it refuses to open and function properly on my phone, absolutely terrible. don’t download this app it’s horrible.  🤮🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: EW
attributes.review:
The app took 8 hours to download 🤧and killed my ramen in the mean time! R.i.p ramen after it download my camera filled with 🍊 pictures! This app is absolutely disgusting 😔 

Trump is a clown 🤡👉👈

attributes.title: very bad and confusing
attributes.review: i’m very much a democrat but i decided to give my very racial loving, non homophobic, non pedo, lover of everyone that are and are not americans president but it disappointed. the app hacked into my phone and it said that if i wanted to be free and to keep my phone i’d have to vote for him which i find very unethical. disappointed nontheless.

attributes.title: 👁👄👁not a tiktoker nope

attributes.review: I took so long to download and stuff this is definitely not fake and definitely not revenge for trying to take down tiktok nope that’s crazy

attributes.review: I don’t understand why the app glitches so much it’s insane. for that just don’t use it

attributes.title: the worst!
attributes.review: this app took forever to download and after using it for a day i found out it took all of my data and now i won’t know if the fbi is watching me or not 🤬 on top of that, all it did was support and show racist and sexist information, among other things. waste of storage! 😡
